divs: Sighting Detailssaw lights, falling from a mile or higher, with friends, yellow round glow, withsparks , looked for did not find on ground anywhere, have lost days and hoursmany times, have had permintions sense the event all have happend after theseeing in my mind totaly random stuff, have them while awake and while sleeping,am really freaked out and worried, though these things would go away they havenot , please help me
